clause.title: General requirements
clause.archive-num: New for 2022 (2019: Volume Two V2.6.1 and V13.12.0)

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A rainwater service must comply with Section 15 of AS/NZS 3500.1.

callout.p: The Victorian NCC 2019 rainwater tank variation (VIC V2.6.1 and V3.12.0 respectively) remains in effect until 30 September 2023 after which the following takes effect:
A rainwater tank must be installed in a Class 1 building in accordance with the regulations made under the Building Act 1993 (Victoria).
